text: imagine the potential of transforming
the daily hustle and bustle of a retail
store into valuable data that is rich
with key insights
by leveraging the power of computer
vision at the edge with aws panorama
philips 66 did just that in the face of
rising labor costs and inflation philip
66 wanted a digital solution that would
drive efficiency maximize revenue and
ensure an experience that keeps
customers coming back
to achieve this objective they worked
with aws panorama and used its
state-of-the-art machine
learning-powered computer vision to
transform store video footage into
real-time actionable data
aws panorama
links philip 66's existing fleet of
cameras to a single management interface
called connected store backed by the aws
cloud connected store is accessible
anywhere at any time to inform real-time
decisions for optimized store operations
this new view of their business empowers
philip 66 store owners and managers to
make data-informed decisions to quickly
respond to store needs and philip 66 is
able to stay in control of their data
and rest assured that all captured video
footage remains private and is not sent
to or stored in the cloud
aws panorama helps philip 66
automatically find crucial data trends
and valuable insights that provide a 360
view of overall store health and help
ensure their employees never miss a beat
from keeping shelves stocked at all
times to quickly responding to a lengthy
checkout line or targeting optimal
promotional spaces philip 66 is now able
to harness the value of their store data
with the power of aws panorama by its
side
